text: [Music]
prince milan once upon a time in a
kingdom far away there lived a cute with
a beard so long that it reached his feet
he was the mighty king caciotta and his
kingdom spanned five rivers and three
forests the King wished to visit every
inch of his lands and rivers and see for
himself that all was well hence he
travelled for a year to the farthest
corners of his kingdom and when he was
satisfied that all was indeed well he
started to journey back home on one such
sultry day this son is being cruel today
if we travel by noon we shall not get
far so let us camp here a few hours till
it is somewhat cooler and then we shall
resume our journey
suddenly the king was consumed with the
thirst so earnest that he thought he
should die if he did not have a drink of
water so he mounted his horse to look
for a river or lake or anything he
searched long and came to a lake with
water as blue as can be and sparkling as
crystal
the king was so consumed by thirst that
he lay on the ground and lapped up the
water as a cat would and after he had
had his fill the king wanted to get up
but something had held fast to his beard
he saw a massive green face looking up
at him from under the water let go off
me or else you shall have to pay the
price
none of your threats will work with me
for here under the water is my world but
I can let you go on one condition what
is it you should give me the most
present and you have in your palace now
and which you know nothing yet
fine I promise at this the monster let
go of the Kings beard and set him free
the king finally reached his palace and
was greeted with much pomp and rejoicing
his queen waited at the gates of the
palace My dear look what the Angels
blessed us with while you were away our
son the prince of this kingdom you shall
give me the most precious thing you have
in your palace now about which you know
nothing yet hmm so this is what the
monster had meant he wants my son what
is the matter darling
aren't you happy to see our son oh my
dear I am overjoyed I am so overwhelmed
that I know not what to say my son the
prince of this kingdom the king could
not sleep for nights together for fear
of the monster taking away his dear son
he ensured that his son was well guarded
at all times but time went by and the
prince grew up to be a brave wise youth
interested in many arts other than
weaponry and the king forgot all about
his fear of the monster
but one day whilst the prince was out
camping in the forest he got separated
from his comrades and was exploring the
forest when Prince Milan the son of the
mighty king caciotta
do I know you sir you don't but your
father dies tell him you met me and that
I am still waiting for him to fulfill
his promise we shall meet again son till
then goodbye the prince told the king
about the strange visitor and the king
had no option but to tell his family
about the promise he had made to the
monster years ago without knowing that
the monster wanted his son on hearing
the story father a promise is a promise
and it must be fulfilled I shall go to
the Green Monster myself but son the
promise was unfair is this a price to
pay for a few gulps of a water whatever
it is mother a promise once made must be
kept and things never really are as bad
as they look I shall certainly find a
way to come back to you but let me go
now the king and queen knew that the
prince was right and so reluctantly
they sent him into the forest to the
lake of the Green Monster when the
Prince went to the lake he saw ten ducks
swimming in it and ten little garments
kept ashore the Prince hid behind a tree
one by one the Ducks came and wore the
garment they changed at once into
beautiful damsels and walked away only
the last damsel remained behind
who is this that I sense hiding behind
the tree I am sorry my lady
when I saw all in the water I knew not
what to do what brings you here Prince
Milan if you know my name then you must
know of the promise my father made to
the rule over the world under the lake
long ago the ruler is my father
I am princess hey Cynthia his youngest
daughter well I do believe it was too
high a price for a few gulps of water
but come with me I shall take you to my
father
so princess hey Cynthia tapped the
ground thrice and the prince and the
princess found themselves in a
magnificent palace before the Green
Monster I see you are finally here
Prince Milan yes your highness I am here
to fulfill the promise my father made
you long ago
finally well tonight you might rest but
tomorrow you must build me a palace of
gold with a hundred chambers and a
garden with a thousand flowers if you
don't your head will roll off here yeah
why wait till tomorrow for that your
highness this task is impossible for me
for I know not how to build a castle
much less one of gold you have okay
tomorrow right away the prince was
sitting in his chamber thinking of what
to do such a feat can only be completed
with magic or
[Music]
yes you need magic to build the castle
you sleep Prince I shall have the palace
ready in no time
using magic no princess that would own
out to achieving the challenge has been
set out for me and I must complete it
fair and square but my father asked your
father to give you up for a few cups of
water that was not fair
but all these years your father caused
no harm to me and whether or not your
father was unfair I will not cheat if
you really want to help me will you do
me a favor anything you say
so the prince asked the princess to
bring him something and the next morning
he went confidently before the monster
oh you have the palace ready oh yes your
highness
here it is what you asked me to make you
a palace in gold with a hundred chambers
and a thousand flowers well you may
count the number of rooms and flowers in
here sire you never specified that you
wanted me to build it on land hence I
built it on canvas that is all this is
very clever of you Prince Milan I must
admit you were right will do me just one
more thing and I shall let you go back
to your father I shall do my best sire
well here is a piece of diamond and is
in my hand if you can take it from me by
morning you are free to go if not your
head will roll off your neck
that night Prince Milan once again
wondered how to take the diamond from
the monsters very hand there was a knock
once again at his window tonight you
shall definitely need magic to fulfill
the task give me permission and I shall
get the diamond for you right now
no princess or that will amount to
cheating thank you for your help but
what my father asks of you is unfair let
it be so but I shall not cheat you could
however help me if you wish will you
bring me something
whatever you say the next morning the
prince went to the court of the monster
rattled and certain of death well here
principle and the Timon is still with me
you fail to fulfill this task I agree
your highness and I accept defeat well
your head must roll off your yak then
aren't you ready yes your highness but
before my head rolls off my neck can I
get a wish for you do agree sire that I
have played fair and square
well alright my great you will wish you
may ask for anything but the diamond
from my hand I wish that my head be
rolled off my neck but from here and not
here since this figure is a replica of
mine this neck and head are also mine
and you only said my head will roll off
my neck you never said I shall have to
die well that is clever of you plants
Milan very well you fulfilled your
promise and I shall fulfill mine you may
go home tell your father he has a fine
time who is wise and clever and who did
not bow to temptation temptation
father asked me to urge you to cheat
just see if you would succumb what you
didn't you kept your cool and your wits
about you and you win fair and square
for that you deserve to live and rule
your kingdom do I take it your highness
now that all of us are friends friends
tell your father he has nothing to fear
about me and that I shall be a friend
for all time to come and if you polled
agree I would like my daughter to marry
you you would make a fine husband to her
excuse me if I kick something you do not
want huh no no we agreed to marry and
hence the Prince returned to his kingdom
the two enemies became friends and the
prince and has Cynthia lived happily
ever after
[Music]
